scripts.client:dev: cd client && npm run changeBaseUrl && next dev
scripts.client:build: cd client && npm run changeBaseUrl -- --nodeenv production && next build
scripts.client:start: cd client && npm run changeBaseUrl -- --nodeenv production && next
scripts.css:build: cd client && npx tailwindcss -i src/assets/styles/index.css -o src/assets/styles/tailwind.css -w
